subject: Order follow up #SSN4262
description_text:
Hello Simsonn team,

I'm following up on order #SSN4262.
I placed the order on the 1st of December.
Last time I talked with you I was advised it would be shipped and delivered
on the 20th of December, however I still have not received it and the
tracking is on "Label Created" ever since.

Any chance you can help me with this or give me any update?
Thank you in advance and wishes for a happy new year.

Kind regards
Tasos

conversations.body_text: Hi Tasos Sklias,  I have reported this issue to our operations team. They will investigate immediately to determine whether it was caused by an incorrectly entered UPS tracking number.

Thank you for this, however it's still 11 days over the suggested delivery
date, and 31 days since the order placement.
I would love to know when I will receive the purchased item please.

Kind regards
